languages.text: "Союз детей Азуриана и человеческого вида? Ты говоришь о невозможном так, что в это... хочется верить. Быть может в твоей реальности, лже-элантах, наши родичи обрели мудрость и терпимость, недоступную моему пониманию".

"An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and humans? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinfolk have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."
languages.original_text: "Союз детей Азуриана и человеческого вида? Ты говоришь о невозможном так, что в это... хочется верить. Быть может в твоей реальности, лже-элантах, наши родичи обрели мудрость и терпимость, недоступную моему пониманию".

traits.locale_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and the human species? You speak of impossible things, and yet... you do it in a way that makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinspeople have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and the human species? You speak of impossible things, and yet... you do it in a way that makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinspeople have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and the human species? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinspeople have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and the human species? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinspeople have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and humans? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinfolk have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and humans? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinfolk have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Una alianza entre los hijos de Asuryan y los humanos? Lo que dices es imposible, pero... tu pasión hace que quiera creerte. Tal vez en tu realidad, fals{mf|o|a} elantach, nuestros pueblos tengan suficiente sabiduría y tolerancia más allá de lo que puedo comprender».
languages.original_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and humans? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinfolk have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."

traits.locale_text: «¿Una alianza entre los hijos de Asuryan y los humanos? Lo que dices es imposible, pero... tu pasión hace que quiera creerte. Tal vez en tu realidad, fals{mf|o|a} elantach, nuestros pueblos tengan suficiente sabiduría y tolerancia más allá de lo que puedo comprender».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Une alliance entre les enfants d'Asuryan et l'espèce humaine ? Ce que vous dites est impossible et pourtant... votre ardeur me donne envie de vous croire. Peut-être que dans votre réalité, {mf|faux|fausse} elantach, nos semblables ont acquis une sagesse et une tolérance qui dépassent mon entendement. »
languages.original_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and humans? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinfolk have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."

traits.locale_text: « Une alliance entre les enfants d'Asuryan et l'espèce humaine ? Ce que vous dites est impossible et pourtant... votre ardeur me donne envie de vous croire. Peut-être que dans votre réalité, {mf|faux|fausse} elantach, nos semblables ont acquis une sagesse et une tolérance qui dépassent mon entendement. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「アシュリアンの御子と人間が同盟を結ぶだと？不可能なことを言う…だが、その熱意は信じてみたくなるな。だが偽のエランタよ、お前の世界で我の同胞たちが身につけている智恵と寛容は、おそらく我の理解の範疇を超えている」
languages.original_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and humans? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinfolk have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリアンの御子と人間が同盟を結ぶだと？不可能なことを言う…だが、その熱意は信じてみたくなるな。だが偽のエランタよ、お前の世界で我の同胞たちが身につけている智恵と寛容は、おそらく我の理解の範疇を超えている」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “阿苏焉的子嗣和人类结盟？这种事情根本不可能发生，不过……你的热情让人情不自禁愿意相信你，虚假的外界人。或许，在你的世界之中，我们的族人得到了我无法理解的智慧与宽容。”
languages.original_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and humans? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinfolk have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."

traits.locale_text: “阿苏焉的子嗣和人类结盟？这种事情根本不可能发生，不过……你的热情让人情不自禁愿意相信你，虚假的外界人。或许，在你的世界之中，我们的族人得到了我无法理解的智慧与宽容。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ein Bündnis zwischen den Kindern von Asuryan und Menschen? Ihr sprecht von unmöglichen Dingen, und doch ... bei Eurer Leidenschaft möchte man Euch fast glauben. Vielleicht, falscher Elantach, hat unser Volk in Eurer Realität Weisheit und Toleranz erlangt, die über mein Verständnis hinausgehen."
languages.original_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and humans? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinfolk have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Bündnis zwischen den Kindern von Asuryan und der menschlichen Spezies? Ihr sprecht von unmöglichen Dingen, und doch ... bei Eurer Leidenschaft möchte man Euch fast glauben. Vielleicht, falscher Elantach, hat unser Volk in Eurer Realität Weisheit und Toleranz erlangt, die über mein Verständnis hinausgehen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Asuryan'ın Çocukları ve insanlar arasında bir ittifak mı? İmkânsız bir şeyden bahsediyorsun ama... Öyle tutkulu anlatıyorsun ki inanasım geliyor. Belki senin gerçekliğinde hısımlarımız, benim anlayamadığım seviyede bilgelik ve dayanıklılık kazanmıştır sahte elantach."
languages.original_text: "An alliance between the Children of Asuryan and humans? You speak of impossible things, and yet... your ardour makes one want to believe you. Perhaps in your reality, false elantach, our kinfolk have gained wisdom and tolerance beyond my understanding."
